title: [QUESTION] Radial gradient with different axis points like Inkscape
body:
![skiasharp radial](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7447285/107530800-7c65c480-6bbc-11eb-8682-dd0715820c15.PNG)

In SkiaSharp (C#) How do you draw a radial gradient with different axis points like we can do in Inkscape. (see image)?
